#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
#define max_value (ll)(1e15)
int main() {
    cin .sync_with_stdio(false);
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--){
        string S ;
        cin >> S ;
        int A[27];
        memset(A , 0 , sizeof A);
        for(int i =0;i< S.size() ;i++)
            A[S[i]  - 'a']++;
        int N , Q ;
        cin >> N >> Q ;
        vector<pair<int , pair< int , char >>> V;
        int prev =0;
        for(int i =0;i<26;i++){
            if(A[i]){
                int occur = A[i]*N;
                int start = prev + 1;
                int ending = prev + occur;
                prev = prev + occur ;
                V.push_back({start , {ending , i + 'a'}});
            }
        }
        int mx = V[V.size() - 1].second.first;
         while(Q--){
            int X ;
            cin >> X ;
            if(X > mx)
                cout << "-1"<<endl;
            else{
                for(int i =0 ;i< V.size();i++){
                    if( X >= V[i].first && X <= V[i].second.first){
                        cout << V[i].second.second<<endl;
                        break;
                    }
                }
            }
         }
    }
}
